verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>; Praise <S%H1984><s%> him <S%H5650><s%>, O ye servants of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>,
Ye that stand <S%H5975><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, In the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>.
Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>; For Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>: Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto his name <S%H8034><s%>; For it is pleasant <S%H5273><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> unto himself <S%H3478><s%>, And Israel for his own possession <S%H5459><s%>.
For I know <S%H3045><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%>, And that our Lord <S%H3068><s%> is above all gods <S%H430><s%>.
Whatsoever Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> pleased <S%H2654><s%>, that hath he done <S%H6213><s%>, In heaven <S%H8064><s%> and in earth <S%H776><s%>, in the seas <S%H3220><s%> and in all deeps <S%H8415><s%>;

Who causeth the vapors <S%H5387><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; Who maketh <S%H6213><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%> for the rain <S%H4306><s%>; Who bringeth <S%H3318><s%> forth the wind <S%H7307><s%> out of his treasuries <S%H214><s%>;
Who smote <S%H5221><s%> the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, Both of man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%>;
Who sent <S%H7971><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee <S%H4714><s%>, O Egypt, Upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and upon all his servants <S%H5650><s%>;
Who smote <S%H5221><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, And slew <S%H2026><s%> mighty <S%H6099><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%>,
Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, And Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, And all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>,
And gave <S%H5414><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> for a heritage <S%H5159><s%>, A heritage <S%H5159><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.
Thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>; Thy memorial <S%H2143><s%> name <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will judge <S%H1777><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, And repent <S%H5162><s%> himself concerning his servants <S%H5650><s%>.
The idols <S%H6091><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> are silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, The work <S%H4639><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>'s hands <S%H3027><s%>.
They have mouths <S%H6310><s%>, but they speak <S%H1696><s%> not <S%H5869><s%>; Eyes have they <S%H7200><s%>, but they see not;
They have ears <S%H241><s%>, but they hear <S%H238><s%> not <S%H3426><s%>; Neither is there any breath <S%H7307><s%> in their mouths <S%H6310><s%>.
They that make <S%H6213><s%> them shall be like unto them <S%H982><s%>; Yea, every one that trusteth in them.
O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, bless <S%H1288><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: O house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, bless <S%H1288><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:
O house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, bless <S%H1288><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Ye that fear <S%H3373><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, bless <S%H1288><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, Who dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>.
